ComicInfo.Series: Dark Horse Classics: Terror of Godzilla
ComicInfo.Summary: *Overview* A Russian nuke is headed toward Tokyo where the Japanese Defense Force's powerful secret weapon Super-X is locked in mortal combat with Godzilla, and Professor Hayashida, the only man in the world who knows how to stop Godzilla, is standing at ground zero! Stuff like this happens everytime Godzilla comes to town!
